blocks.name: opeliun2xp
blocks.content: Membership of an ordered pair in a union of Cartesian products over its second component, analogous to ~ opeliunxp . (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm opeliun2xp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))), wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  eleq2i(cop(c0, cv(s0)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  elab(hs0, cop(c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  opex(c0, cv(s0))
  syl5bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))), wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  df-rex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  cbvexv1(s0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))))))
  nfv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))
  nfan(s0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))))
  nfxp(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  nfcv(s0, csn(cv(hs1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  xpeq12d(c2, csn(cv(s0)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  exbidv(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(s0))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(s0))), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))))
  bitri(wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))))
  exbii(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))))
  3bitri(wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))))
  anbi2i(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1)))))
  opelxp(c0, cv(s0), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))
  bitri(wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  an13(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))
  ancom(wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  velsn(s0, cv(hs1))
  equcom(s0, hs1)
  ceqsexv(hs1, cv(s0), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
  vex(s0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  sbequ12r(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2d(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))
  eqcomd(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))
  equcoms(hs1, s0, wceq(c2, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
}

blocks.name: eliunxp2
blocks.content: Membership in a union of Cartesian products over its second component, analogous to ~ eliunxp . (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliunxp2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))))
  3bitr2i(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))), wa(wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))), wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))))
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  mpan(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))
  mpbir(wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  relxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))
  reliun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  elrel(s1, s0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c0)
  excom(s0, s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  19.41(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))
  nfel2(s0, c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  nfiu1(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  bitr3i(wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))))
  19.41v(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))
  exbii(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  pm5.32i(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl6bb(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  opeliun2xp(s0, cv(s1), c1, c2)
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  excom(s0, s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  diff.ciun.s(s1, s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c2, csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mpt2mptx2
blocks.content: Express a two-argument function as a one-argument function, or vice-versa. In this version ` A ( y ) ` is not assumed to be constant w.r.t ` y ` , analogous to ~ mpt2mptx . (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2mptx2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1)))), c2), cmpo(s2, s1, c1, c0, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1)))), c2), cmpo(s2, s1, c1, c0, c3), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1)))), c2)
  eqtr4i(cmpo(s2, s1, c1, c0, c3), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s2, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  df-mpo(s2, s1, hs0, c1, c0, c3)
  eqtr4i(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s2, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), copab(s0, hs0, wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))))))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  3bitr2i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))), wa(wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))))
  eliunxp2(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  19.41vv(s2, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  2exbii(s2, s1, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  bitri(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  anass(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  pm5.32i(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))))

  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s1, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)

  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))

}

blocks.name: cbvmpt2x2
blocks.content: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution. This version of ~ cbvmpt2 allows ` A ` to be a function of ` y ` , analogous to ~ cbvmpt2x . (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2019.)

thm cbvmpt2x2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s2, s3, c3, c1, c4))
  -| wnfc(s3, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c3)
  -| wnfc(s3, c2)
  -| wnfc(s2, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wnfc(s1, c4)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s2, s3, c3, c1, c4), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s2, s3, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  cbvoprab12(s0, s1, hs0, s2, s3, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  nfan(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfan(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  nfv(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nfv(s2, wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  nfeq2(s2, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfan(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfan(s3, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  nfcri(s3, s0, c0)
  nfv(s3, wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  nfeq2(s3, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfan(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c3))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s3), c1))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  nfan(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1))
  nfcri(s1, s2, c3)
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s3), c1))
  nfeq2(s1, cv(hs0), c4)
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c1))
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  eleq2d(cv(s2), c0, c3, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)))
  eleq1d(cv(s1), c1, cv(s3), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))))
  simpr(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c4, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))))
  ancoms(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(c2, c4))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)

  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s3), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s3), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm cbvmpt2x2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s2 ∈ c3, s3 ∈ c1 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ F/(s3, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c3)
  ⊣ F/(s3, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c4)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c4)
  ⊣ (s1 = s3 → c0 = c3)
  ⊣ ((s1 = s3 ∧ s0 = s2)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s2 ∈ c3, s3 ∈ c1 ↦ c4), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < < s2, s3 >, hs0 > |((s2 ∈ c3 ∧ s3 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c4)})
  cbvoprab12(s0, s1, hs0, s2, s3, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s2 ∈ c3 ∧ s3 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c4))
  nfan(s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2)
  nfan(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s2, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s2, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfeq2(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfan(s3, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2)
  nfan(s3, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfcri(s3, s0, c0)
  nfv(s3, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfeq2(s3, hs0, c2)
  nfan(s0, (s2 ∈ c3 ∧ s3 ∈ c1), hs0 = c4)
  nfan(s0, s2 ∈ c3, s3 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s0, s2 ∈ c3)
  nfv(s0, s3 ∈ c1)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c4)
  nfan(s1, (s2 ∈ c3 ∧ s3 ∈ c1), hs0 = c4)
  nfan(s1, s2 ∈ c3, s3 ∈ c1)
  nfcri(s1, s2, c3)
  nfv(s1, s3 ∈ c1)
  nfeq2(s1, hs0, c4)
  anbi12d((s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2, (s2 ∈ c3 ∧ s3 ∈ c1), hs0 = c4)
  anbi12d((s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3), s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c3, s3 ∈ c1)
  sylan9bb(s0 = s2, s1 = s3, s0 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c3, s2 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  eleq2d(s2, c0, c3, s1 = s3)
  eleq1d(s1, c1, s3, (s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3))
  simpr(s0 = s2, s1 = s3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c4, (s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3))
  ancoms(s0 = s2, s1 = s3, c2 = c4)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s2, s3, hs0, c3, c1, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)

  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: dmmpt2ssx2
blocks.content: The domain of a mapping is a subset of its base classes expressed as union of Cartesian products over its second component, analogous to ~ dmmpt2ssx . (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmmpt2ssx2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wss(cdm(c0), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s1, s0, c2, c1, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sseqtr4i(cdm(c0), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), ciun(hs0, c1, cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  dmmptss(hs1, c0, ciun(hs0, c1, cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csn(cv(hs0)))), csb(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3)))
  3eqtr4i(c0, cmpt(hs1, ciun(hs0, c1, cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csn(cv(hs0)))), csb(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3))), cmpo(s1, s0, c2, c1, c3), cmpo(hs2, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))))
  cbvmpt2x2(s1, s0, hs2, hs0, c2, c1, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)))
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcv(hs2, c3)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(hs2), c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))
  sylan9eqr(c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs2)))
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(hs2), c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))
  mpt2mptx2(hs1, hs0, hs2, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)))
  eqtrd(csb(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  csbeq1d(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  op2ndd(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  csbeq2dv(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  csbeq1d(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), c3, cv(hs2), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  op1std(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs2)
  vex(hs0)
  cbviun(s0, hs0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csn(cv(hs0))))
  nfcv(hs0, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  nfxp(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csn(cv(hs0)))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcv(s0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  xpeq12d(c2, csn(cv(s0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(ciun(hs0, c1, cxp(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csn(cv(hs0)))))

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm dmmpt2ssx2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ dom(c0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 × { s0 }))
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  sseqtr4i(dom(c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 × { s0 })), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1,([hs0 / s0]c2 × { hs0 })))
  dmmptss(hs1, c0, ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1,([hs0 / s0]c2 × { hs0 })), [(2nd ` hs1)/ s0][(1st ` hs1)/ s1]c3)
  3eqtr4i(c0, (hs1 ∈ ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1,([hs0 / s0]c2 × { hs0 }))↦[(2nd ` hs1)/ s0][(1st ` hs1)/ s1]c3), (s1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), (hs2 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2, hs0 ∈ c1 ↦[hs0 / s0][hs2 / s1]c3))
  cbvmpt2x2(s1, s0, hs2, hs0, c2, c1, c3, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0][hs2 / s1]c3)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcv(hs2, c3)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, hs0, [hs2 / s1]c3)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfcsb1v(s1, hs2, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, [hs2 / s1]c3)
  sylan9eqr(c3, [hs0 / s0][hs2 / s1]c3, [hs2 / s1]c3, s0 = hs0, s1 = hs2)
  csbeq1a(s1, hs2, c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, [hs2 / s1]c3)
  mpt2mptx2(hs1, hs0, hs2, c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, [(2nd ` hs1)/ s0][(1st ` hs1)/ s1]c3, [hs0 / s0][hs2 / s1]c3)
  eqtrd([(2nd ` hs1)/ s0][(1st ` hs1)/ s1]c3, [hs0 / s0][hs2 / s1]c3, [hs0 / s0][(1st ` hs1)/ s1]c3, hs1 = < hs2, hs0 >)
  csbeq1d(s0, (2nd ` hs1), [(1st ` hs1)/ s1]c3, hs0, hs1 = < hs2, hs0 >)
  op2ndd(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  csbeq2dv(s0, hs0, [(1st ` hs1)/ s1]c3, [hs2 / s1]c3, hs1 = < hs2, hs0 >)
  csbeq1d(s1, (1st ` hs1), c3, hs2, hs1 = < hs2, hs0 >)
  op1std(hs1, hs2, hs0)
